meanings.sent1: The new mattress was spongier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The sponge became spongier after soaking up water.
meanings.sent3: I tried to sit on the spongier side of the couch, but it swallowed me whole!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt spongier than a sponge, absorbing all the sadness around her.
meanings.sent5: The clouds looked spongier than cotton candy, floating gently in the sky.

meanings.definition: More absorbent or elastic than something else
meanings.sent1: The paper towel was spongier than the napkin.
meanings.sent2: The sponge became spongier as it absorbed more liquid.
meanings.sent3: The trampoline felt spongier than usual, bouncing everyone higher.
meanings.sent4: His mind was spongier than a sponge, soaking up knowledge effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The soil in the garden was spongier than expected, holding onto water for the plants.
